description: Do Not Modify. Generated by Event Schema Generator v1.0.15 on 2025-Jun-05 02:04:35

BMS_StateOfCharge.description: Units: Percent. Current state of charge of Asset's/Truck's battery. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BMS_BatteryTemp.description: Units: 1 DegC/Bit. Temperature of Asset's/Truck's battery system. A value of -128 indicates an error reading.

BMS_DCVoltage.description: Units: 0.0625 V/Bit. DC Voltage at the Asset's/Truck's battery terminal. A value of 65535 indicates an error reading.

BMS_DCCurrent.description: Units: 0.0625 A/Bit. DC Current at the Asset's/Truck's battery terminal. A value of -32768 indicates an error reading.

BMS_ThermalDerate.description: Units: 1 Percent/Bit. Asset/Truck performance derate as a percentage activated when the battery temperature approaches its thermal limit. A value of zero means full performance allowed, a Value above zero results in reduction of Asset/Truck performance i.e. top speed, acceleration and lift speed. A value of -1 indicates an error reading.

BMS_InhibitOperation.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's operation is inhibited.

BMS_ImmediateShutdown.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset/Truck is in immediate shutdown and cannot be operated.

BMS_LimitedOperation.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's operations are limited. The Asset/Truck activates this mode when the Battery State of Charge is low or a fault condition occurs that does not require immediate shutdown.

BMS_ChargerConnected.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates charger is currently connected to the Asset's/Truck's battery. The Asset/Truck will disable the traction system while the charger is connected.

BMS_LiftLockout.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset's/Truck's hoist function is disabled. The Asset/Truck activates this mode when the Battery State of Charge is low.

BMS_ThermalDerateEnable.description: Units: Boolean. When true indicates Asset/Truck thermal derate is active. The Asset/Truck activates this mode when the battery temperature approaches its thermal limit. In this mode the Asset/Truck reduces top speed, acceleration and lift speed reducing the overall average power consumption in an attempt to allow the battery to cool.

BAT2_RunningValue.description: Units: 0.125 percent. SOH, Running Value, percent of beginning life of Capacity (kWh) (3001:04)
